heif.boxes

Class DataInformationBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • heif.boxes.Box
      • heif.boxes.DataInformationBox

  • public class DataInformationBox
extends Box
    This derived Box class handles the Box identified as dinf - Data Information Box. For technical details, refer to the Specification document - ISO/IEC 14496-12:2015 on Page 45 to 46. The data information box contains objects that declare the location of the media information in a track.

    API Note: Additional testing is required to validate the reliability and robustness of this implementation.

    Since:
    13 August 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DataInformationBox.DataEntryBox
      An inner class used to store a DataEntryBox object, containing information such as URL location and name.
      static class  DataInformationBox.DataReferenceBox
      An inner class designed to fill up the dref box type.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataInformationBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      This constructor creates a derived Box object, providing additional information from other contained boxes, specifically dref - Data Reference Box and its nested contained boxes, where further additional information on URL location and name is provided.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataInformationBox

        public DataInformationBox(Box box,
                          SequentialByteReader reader)
        This constructor creates a derived Box object, providing additional information from other contained boxes, specifically dref - Data Reference Box and its nested contained boxes, where further additional information on URL location and name is provided.
        Parameters:
        box - the super Box object
        reader - a SequentialByteReader object for sequential byte array access

    • Method Detail

      • getBoxList

        public java.util.List<Box> getBoxList()
        Returns a combined list of all boxes contained in this DataInformationBox, particularly the DataReferenceBox (dref).
        Overrides:
        getBoxList in class Box
        Returns:
        a combined list of Box objects in reading order

      • logBoxInfo

        public void logBoxInfo()
        Logs a single diagnostic line for this box at the debug level.

        This is useful when traversing the box tree of a HEIF/ISO-BMFF structure for debugging or inspection purposes.

        Overrides:
        logBoxInfo in class Box
